Brighten your day every time you open a new tab with the Random Compliment Generator!

This Chrome extension delivers a unique and uplifting compliment each time you start a new browsing session. Whether you need a confidence boost, a quick smile, or just a reminder of how amazing you are, this extension has you covered.

Why install it?

Daily Positivity: Start each new tab with an encouraging and personalized touch.

Feel-Good Moments: Enjoy a break from the stress of your day with compliments designed to uplift and inspire.

Clean, Simple Design: A distraction-free experience that puts the focus on making you feel great.

Support the Developer: Like what you see? There's an easy way to show your appreciation via Ko-fi!
